attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user quota instance.

attributes.name: gpLeft
attributes.description: Remaining grace period when the soft limit is exceeded.

attributes.name: hardLimit
attributes.description: Hard limit.The value 0 means no limitations

attributes.name: softLimit
attributes.description: Soft limit.The value 0 means no limitations

attributes.name: sizeUsed
attributes.description: Size already used by the user
